title: Who’s Attending COP27, and Who Isn’t
description: The leaders of some of history’s largest polluters are slated to speak, as are those from countries that are bearing the brunt of the effects of climate change.
dc:creator: Somini Sengupta
media:description: The president of the European Union, Ursula Von der Leyen, and Britain’s prime minister, Rishi Sunak, at the COP27 climate conference in Sharm el Sheikh, Egypt, on Monday.
